content.text:
# List of honours of Spain awarded to heads of state and royalty

This article serves as an index – as complete as possible – of all the honorific orders or similar decorations awarded by Spain, classified by Monarchies chapter and Republics chapter, and, under each chapter, recipients' countries and the detailed list of recipients.
Awards
Monarchies
Spain
*King Felipe VI of Spain:
**Sovereign (since 19 June 2014) and Knight of the Order of the Golden Fleece (3 May 1981)
**Sovereign (since 19 June 2014) and Collar of the Order of Charles III (24 January 1986)
**Sovereign of the Order of Isabella the Catholic (since 19 June 2014)
**Sovereign of the Order of Civil Merit (since 19 June 2014)
**Sovereign of the Order of Queen Maria Luisa (since 19 June 2014)
**Sovereign (since 19 June 2014) and Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Military Merit, with white distinctive (7 July 1986)
**Sovereign (since 19 June 2014) and Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Naval Merit, with white distinctive (13 July 1987)
**Sovereign (since 19 June 2014) and Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Aeronautical Merit, with white distinctive (4 July 1988)
**Sovereign (since 19 June 2014) and Knight Grand Cross of the Royal and Military Order of Saint Hermenegild (30 April 1999)
*Queen Letizia of Spain:
**Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Charles III (21 May 2004)
**Grand Mistress (de facto) of the Order of Queen Maria Luisa (since 19 June 2014)
*King Juan Carlos I of Spain:
**Knight and former Sovereign (19752014) of the Order of the Golden Fleece
**Collar and former Sovereign (19752014) of the Order of Charles III
**Former Sovereign of the Order of Isabella the Catholic (19752014)
**Former Sovereign of the Order of Civil Merit (1975-2014)
**Former Sovereign of the Order of Queen Maria Luisa (19752014)
**Former Sovereign of the Royal and Military Order of Saint Hermenegild (19752014)
**Former Sovereign of the Royal and Military Order of Saint Ferdinand (19752014)
**Former Sovereign of the Order of Montesa (19752014)
**Former Sovereign of the Order of Alcántara (19752014)
**Former Sovereign of the Order of Calatrava (19752014)
**Former Sovereign of the Order of Santiago (19752014)
*Queen Sofía of Spain:
**Collar of the Order of Charles III (1983)
**Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Charles III
**Dame and former Grand Mistress (19752014) of the Order of Queen Maria Luisa (14 May 1962)
*Leonor, Princess of Asturias:
**Lady of the Order of the Golden Fleece (30 October 2015)
**Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Charles III (31 October 2023)
*Infanta Elena, Duchess of Lugo:
**Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Charles III (14 October 1988)
**Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Isabella the Catholic
**Dame of the Royal Cavalry Armory of Seville
**Dame of the Royal Cavalry Armory of Zaragoza

**Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Isabella the Catholic (13 June 1983)

**Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Charles III (14 October 1988)
**Dame of the Order of Queen Maria Luisa (6 March 1957)
**Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Alfonso X the Wise (25 April 2003)

*Infanta Alicia, Dowager Duchess of Calabria: Dame of the Royal Order of Maria Luisa
*Infante Carlos, Duke of Calabria: Knight of the Order of the Golden Fleece
